api_list.name: Events

optional_parameters.name: cat
optional_parameters.description: Sport Type ( optional, default - football )  possible values: football, hockey, basketball, tennis, volleyball, handball, american_football, athletics, aussie_rules, badminton, bandy, baseball, beach_soccer, beach_volleyball, billiards, boxing, canoe_racing, climbing, combat_sports, cricket, curling, cycling, dancesport, darts, e-sports, equestrianism, extreme_sport, fencing, field_hockey, floorball, footvolley, futsal, gaelic_football, golf, gymnastics, korfball, netball, padel_tennis, poker, racing, rugby_league, rugby_sevens, rugby_union, sailing, shooting_sport, softball, squash, table_tennis, water_polo, water_sports, winter, other

optional_parameters.name: isLive
optional_parameters.description: is live event ( optional, default - all )  possible values: 0, 1

optional_parameters.name: lng
optional_parameters.description: language ( optional, default - en )  possible values: en, de, fr, es, it, pl, pt, ua, tr, rs, bg, ru

api_list.name: Live Events
api_list.description: To Get Only Live Sporting Events

optional_parameters.name: lng
optional_parameters.description: language ( optional, default - en )  possible values: en, de, fr, es, it, pl, pt, ua, tr, rs, bg, ru
